item.title: Nanu, the free calling app, provides a fresh approach to connecting with customers
item.description: Source: nanu website. Nanu, the first entirely free mobile calling app, is experiencing rapid growth in its monthly and daily active users. Based in Singapore, the startup claims its app’s active user rates are almost twice the industry standard, with 56% monthly active users and 19% daily active users. CEO Martin Nygate points out that many tech startups avoid disclosing these figures due to poor performance. He’s pleased to share nanu’s positive data, reflecting both strong download numbers and increasing app usage.
